title: How do you feel? Measuring User-Perceived Value for Rejecting Machine Decisions in Hate Speech Detection
authors: Philippe Lammerts, Philip Lippmann, Yen-Chia Hsu, Fabio Casati, and Jie Yang
participantInfo: 160 participants, Prolific (18+, fluent in English, approval rating > 90%), experience using social media

incentiveScheme.incentiveSchemeAsReported: Every participant is paid an hourly wage of 9 GBP, exceeding the UK minimum wage at the time of the study.
